content: Hi, has anyone here tried authoring and rendering questionnaires with image attachments using the SDC lib and render them? How did you go about it? Also, has anyone tried to submit QuestionnaureResponses with the image attachment? How did you go about it ? Did you use base64encoded? Some help/clarity will go a long way. Thanks
valueAttachment would need to be base64 encoded. Typically they wouldn't be rendered inline, though I suppose they could be.
